attributes.action: examine the anomaly. of paying for nursinng care and residential care in England, but not in Wales, Scotland or Ulster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since devolution, England has suffered when it come to nursing and residential care.  This is free in Wales, Scotland and Ulster, but not in England.Discrimination yes. The ederly have more to fear that other sections of the former United Kingdom. They have to pay for their care. Even have their homes, sold from beneath them. Our government knows of this anomaly but does nothing about it,UNFAIR
